title: Nicholas Hoult on Being Given Darker Roles and Working With Robert Eggers, Clint Eastwood and Justin Kurzel in the Space of a Year
summary: Has Nicholas Hoult gone over to the dark side? Speaking at the Variety Lounge presented by Red Sea Film Festival, the actor acknowledged that characters such as Lex Luthor in “Superman,” as well as Thomas Hutter in “Nosferatu,” Justin Kemp in “Juror #2” and Bob Mathews in “The Order” had all been d…
